abstract: Credit Suisse reports earnings of 1.05 billion Swiss francs, around $1.09 billion, in second quarter, compared to 700 million franc loss in quarter year earlier, due to litigation charge in United States tax evasion case of 1.6 billion francs; revenue was 6.94 billion francs, up 8 percent from 6.43 billion francs in quarter year earlier.
lead_paragraph: The Swiss bank said that it benefited from strong results in the Asia-Pacific region, but that weakness in the fixed-income markets pressured its investment bank.

headline.main: Credit Suisse Swings to Profit in Second Quarter
headline.print_headline: Credit Suisse Chief Looks to Asia and Wealth Unit

snippet: The Swiss bank said that it benefited from strong results in the Asia-Pacific region, but that weakness in the fixed-income markets pressured its investment bank.
